statements: SELECT * FROM digital_nomads_contact_information;
SELECT full_name, email FROM digital_nomads_contact_information;
SELECT * FROM digital_nomads_contact_information WHERE id = 'abc123';
SELECT location, skills FROM digital_nomads_contact_information WHERE email = 'example@example.com';
SELECT id, full_name, phone_number FROM digital_nomads_contact_information ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM digital_nomads_contact_information ORDER BY full_name DESC, email ASC;
SELECT id, full_name, phone_number FROM digital_nomads_contact_information WHERE location = 'Remote';
SELECT full_name, skills->'languages' AS spoken_languages FROM digital_nomads_contact_information WHERE skills->'experience' > 3;
SELECT full_name, email, phone_number FROM digital_nomads_contact_information WHERE interests->'hobbies' LIKE '%surfing%';
SELECT * FROM digital_nomads_contact_information WHERE location = 'Bali' AND interests->'travel' = 'Yes';
SELECT * FROM contacts WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM contacts WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT id, name, location FROM contacts WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM connections WHERE connection_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM connections WHERE connection_type = 'Professional' ORDER BY connection_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM contacts WHERE name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT name, email FROM contacts WHERE location='New York' AND skills LIKE '%Python%'
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM contacts WHERE skills='Java'
SELECT id, name, location FROM contacts WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY name
SELECT * FROM connections WHERE connection_type='Friend' ORDER BY connection_date DESC
SELECT * FROM nomads_contacts;
SELECT id, fullname, email FROM nomads_contacts WHERE job_title = 'Software Engineer';
SELECT fullname, email, location FROM nomads_contacts ORDER BY fullname ASC;
SELECT id, email FROM nomads_contacts WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM nomads_connections WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY user_id, connection_id;
SELECT * FROM nomads_contacts WHERE job_title = 'Developer';
SELECT fullname, email FROM nomads_contacts ORDER BY fullname DESC;
SELECT id, location FROM nomads_contacts WHERE id < 5;
SELECT * FROM nomads_interests WHERE interest LIKE '%technology%';
SELECT c.fullname, i.interest FROM nomads_contacts c JOIN nomads_interests i ON c.id = i.user_id;
SELECT * FROM digital_nomads;
SELECT name, email FROM remote_workers ORDER BY experience_years DESC;
SELECT contact_name, linkedin_profile FROM networking_contacts WHERE email='example@email.com';
SELECT * FROM digital_nomads WHERE location='Digital Nomad Island';
SELECT occupation, skills, experience_years FROM remote_workers WHERE experience_years > 3;
SELECT * FROM digital_nomads ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, location FROM digital_nomads WHERE location='Bali';
SELECT * FROM remote_workers WHERE experience_years > 3 ORDER BY experience_years DESC;
SELECT contact_name, email FROM networking_contacts WHERE linkedin_profile IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, job_type, preferred_location FROM work_preferences WHERE availability='Full-time';
SELECT * FROM digital_nomads_contacts;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM digital_nomads_contacts WHERE location = 'Remote';
SELECT space_name, location, capacity FROM coworking_spaces ORDER BY space_id DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date, location FROM networking_events WHERE organizer = 'Digital Nomad Society';
SELECT group_name, location, group_type FROM digital_nomad_groups WHERE description LIKE '%community%' ORDER BY group_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM digital_nomads_contacts;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM digital_nomads_contacts WHERE location = 'Bali';
SELECT space_name, location, capacity, amenities FROM coworking_spaces WHERE capacity > 50 ORDER BY space_name DESC;
SELECT group_name, location, description FROM digital_nomad_groups WHERE group_type = 'Remote Work' AND location IN ('Thailand', 'Spain');
SELECT event_name, event_date, location, organizer FROM networking_events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date ASC;
